name: Super Fruiters
description:
Made for LudumDare 52
Theme: Harvest

A small project whipped up in  a few hours as I didn't really have time on the LD52 weekend. Plant your fruits and craft the ordered things.

You can build your selected plant or contraption with the left mouse button and demolish the selected field with the right mouse button. When demolishing you get back your paid seeds and 30% of the money for contraptions.
